elements.name: @TMS_425_01 Verify that Enter FDM Email Address input field is available.

steps.name: User is naviated to login page
I click on forgot password link
It should redirect to forgot password page
I click on Enter FDM Email address
it should be clickable and viewable
Take a screenshot and saving it in "src/test/resources/Screenshots/GeneralUsers/Sprint_2/" as "TMS_425_01"

elements.name: @TMS_425_02 Verify that user can enter text in ‘Enter FDM Email Address’

steps.name: User is naviated to login page
I click on forgot password link
It should redirect to forgot password page
I click on Enter FDM Email address
it should accept text

steps.name: User is naviated to login page

I click on Confirm FDM Email address
it should be clickable and viewable

elements.name: @TMS_425_04 Verify that user can enter text in ‘Confirm FDM Email Address’

steps.name: User is naviated to login page
I click on forgot password link

I click on Confirm FDM Email address
it should accept text

elements.name: @TMS_425_05 Verify that ‘Request new password’ button is clickable

steps.name: User is naviated to login page
I click on forgot password link
It should redirect to forgot password page
I click on request new password button
it should be clickable
Take a screenshot and saving it in "src/test/resources/Screenshots/GeneralUsers/Sprint_2/" as "TMS_425_05"

elements.name: @TMS_425_06 Verify that clicking on ‘Back to Login’ will redirect to login page

steps.name: User is naviated to login page
I click on forgot password link
It should redirect to forgot password page
I click on back to login button
it should redirect to login page
Take a screenshot and saving it in "src/test/resources/Screenshots/GeneralUsers/Sprint_2/" as "TMS_425_06"

elements.name: @TMS_425_07 Verify that user is receiving ‘Please enter a valid FDM email address’ error if its not ending with @fdmgroup.com

steps.name: User is naviated to login page
I click on forgot password link
It should redirect to forgot password page
I click on Enter FDM email address
I write the email address that's not end with @fdmgroup.com
it should give the error
Take a screenshot and saving it in "src/test/resources/Screenshots/GeneralUsers/Sprint_2/" as "TMS_425_07"

elements.name: @TMS_425_08 Verify that email passed in both the fields of enter fdm email and confirm email matches with each other

steps.name: User is naviated to login page
I click on forgot password link
It should redirect to forgot password page
I enter FDM email address
I enter Confirm FDM email address
both fields should match
Take a screenshot and saving it in "src/test/resources/Screenshots/GeneralUsers/Sprint_2/" as "TMS_425_08"

elements.name: @TMS_425_09 Verify that user is receiving ‘Emails do not match. Please try again’ error if both of fields are not matching with each other

steps.name: User is naviated to login page
I click on forgot password link
It should redirect to forgot password page
I click on Enter FDM email address
I write the email address
I click on Confirm FDM email address
I write the email address different than first field
It should give the error ‘The entered email does not match’
Take a screenshot and saving it in "src/test/resources/Screenshots/GeneralUsers/Sprint_2/" as "TMS_425_09"

elements.name: @TMS_425_10 Verify that user receives Password reset request submited once it enter valid username password

steps.name: User is naviated to login page
I click on forgot password link
It should redirect to forgot password page
I enter valid Confirm FDM email address
I enter valid FDM email address
I click on Request new password button
it should be clickable and should display confirmation message Password reset request submited
Take a screenshot and saving it in "src/test/resources/Screenshots/GeneralUsers/Sprint_2/" as "TMS_425_10"

name: As a user, I would like to be able  to request a new password if I've forgotten my password,
description: so that I can regain access to the system.
